Next: Cooperation

Here are some of the problems we noticed as we went along. They seem to share some common themes.

  • Stuck

  • Magical Thinking

  • Stasis

  • Navel Gazing

  • Isolation

  • Misunderstanding power

Other possible anti-patterns

A pattern for something that’s negative or you’d want to avoid. It can include a bogus solution or a solution with a bunch of negative side effects.

  • Burnout

Next steps

If we go with a problem-solution-context outline for the book as a whole (as per §"TO BEGIN WITH, AN INTUITIVE THOUGHT", here), then these antipatterns and others are likely to be important themes to look at in the introduction.
